Source.Name: lxqt-openssh-askpass
Source.Summary: GUI to query passwords on behalf of SSH agents.
Source.Description: lxqt-openssh-askpass is a GUI to query credentials on behalf of other programs. As indicated by its name it's primarily targeted at ssh-agent, the SSH agent of OpenSSH, but it works with other applications like e. g. EncFS as well.

Package.Name: lxqt-openssh-askpass
Package.Summary: GUI to query passwords on behalf of SSH agents.
Package.Description: lxqt-openssh-askpass is a GUI to query credentials on behalf of other programs. As indicated by its name it's primarily targeted at ssh-agent, the SSH agent of OpenSSH, but it works with other applications like e. g. EncFS as well.
